CmdLine: curl -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_7.x | bash - &&   curl -sS https://dl.yarnpkg.com/debian/pubkey.gpg | apt-key add - &&   echo "deb https://dl.yarnpkg.com/debian/ stable main" | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/yarn.list &&   apt-get update &&   apt-get install -qq -y build-essential nodejs yarn   libpq-dev postgresql-client-9.4 --fix-missing --no-install-recommends &&   rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run
